Reviews.Title: “Average hotel at a great value for money”
Reviews.Author: marcnicolas
Reviews.Content: stayed nights nh berlin city west short trip berlin december hotel average service reception okay stayed single equipped necessities bathroom clean tiny doors floor carpeting hallways looked cheap fitness equipped bar aswell nice breakfast tables bar extension soon lobby bar comes location hotel bit centre public transport close plus hotel pricing clean bed sleep fancy consider hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “A solid 3 stars hotel, definitely does not deserve a 4 stars rating”
Reviews.Author: kurtzuegg
Reviews.Content: ideally located nevertheless city center found hotel disappointing 4 star top floor advantage balcony view city clean nice furniture fittings spartan personnel reception desk nice beware waiters bar found unfriendly unpleasant couldnt advantage buffet breakfast looked nice nor hotel amenity else hotel classed 3 start 4 rating tripadvisor

Reviews.Title: “Great breakfast for a 4 star!”
Reviews.Author: Bunal
Reviews.Content: metro station enterence 50m hotel travelling metro bus network easy cheat berlin makes easy hotel clean quiet reception employees helpful hotel buffet breakfast wide variety cheese breads yogurts egg cold hot drinks etc

Reviews.Title: “Could do Better .... A lot better”
Reviews.Author: summerhouse2
Reviews.Content: firstly staff extremely friendly accommodating call reception requesting brought minutes apartment living double bedroom kitchen fridge cooker crockery cutlery untensils etc bathroom bathroom clean apartment little tired grubby paintwork walls bed comfortable single duvets zip mattress living round table chairs faux leather chairs sofa bed tv english channels news noisy 5th floor breakfast included rate charged extra priced double usual buffet style serve yourself selection cold meats cheeses cereals pastries bread hot alternative poor quality produce poorly cooked eg scrambled egg offered sliced stayed id breakfast elsewhere coffee plentiful major criticism wifi internet connection business package cost hour 24hours seven days economy alternative started 24hrs truncated rip discourage business traveller am day wifi evening morning 24 hours fairer price 24 hours stay 24 hour period standard hotel adequate apart aforementioned aiming business traveller budget traveller premier inn aint

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: Brightonian
Reviews.Content: hotel residential close bahn berliner str connections db train stations flying schonefeld attending exhibition convenient spacious clean requirements including minibar toiletries mineral water etc spent time internet access pricey €17 24hrs didnt bar service nice cheap pizza restaurant road

Reviews.Title: “Slightly dissapointed”
Reviews.Author: cpjk
Reviews.Content: booked weekend trip berlin decided stay nh berlin city west information various websites stated hotel located walking distance kurfurstendamm main reasons choosing hotel unfortuantely information incorrect 20 minute walk shopping streets hotel fine receptionists friendly clean

Reviews.Title: “Good all round hotel”
Reviews.Author: infast
Reviews.Content: hotel fine spacious staff friendly location access berlin using underground system breakfast selection hot cold complaint air conditioning july warm location windows ventilation morning traffic noise loud

Reviews.Title: “A nice and clean hotel with some drawbacks”
Reviews.Author: Natallia10
Reviews.Content: hotel bed doublebed single beds tended move apart moves breakfast opinion expensive 16 euro person price meal berlin 100200 meters hotel nice breakfast half price hotel nice clean bit overpriced fits business trip romantic trip choose
